# Exam issues :: Zespół Geoinformacji, Fotogrametrii i Teledetekcji Środowiska

URL: https://twiki.fotogrametria.agh.edu.pl/c5www/index.php/exam-issues
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:31

REMOTE SENSING AND GEO-INFORMATICS (RSGI) master 

2 dates of entrance exam: 21.07.2023 and 15.09.2023

on-line, starts 9:00, takes 1 h and is open whole day

will be up to date soon

see on AGH website Department for International Students

Education offer - Master studies

Examination Topics:

Definition of a digital image, image as a matrix, RGB color model.

Basic operations related to digital image processing.

Spatial resolution of aerial/satellite imagery, ground pixel size, number of pixels, image size.

Basics of analytical geometry, distance, area calculation.

Concept of map scale.

Basic of statistics, mean value and standard deviation, estimators of the mean: arithmetic mean, geometric mean, median, mode; correlation coefficient, coefficient of determination.

Basic information about databases.

Solving linear and exponential equations.

Spectral indices (e.g. NDVI – Normalized Vegetation Index)

Photo interpretation.

Photographic image, negative-positive, brightness, contrast, histogram.

Electromagnetic radiation, spectral curve.

Map algebra, logical operations.
